comment: Very easy-to-navigate online class! This professor is very passionate and great at teaching, even in an online settings. Three lock down browser exams, which were very manageable and often very similar difficulty to the weekly quizzes. Expect weekly quizzes and labs.

Professor Bartels is an amazing professor! She gives really good feedback and helps you prepare for the exams. Her class consists of a quiz and lab every week, a discussion post every two weeks, and three exams (lockdown with webcam). Overall a super great and caring professor!
He had a good class. One quiz and lab a week then 3 exams. Everything was graded fast. Responds to emails pretty quick.

His class was not bad. There are quizzes, labs, discussion boards and 3 tests. The tests are on lockdown browser but if you study the quizzes and study guide it will by easy. Everything in the course was well organized as well.

I took GEOG1112K online, and you will get all the info you need from the slides, don't buy the book. This class is very information heavy and the lectures are unnarrated PowerPoint slides, so if you'd like audio lectures, take a different professor. Work was labs, quizzes, and tests, and the tests were fairly easy if you studied.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Ok so I took this class thinking it'd be so easy. The professor himself was a good communicator and had a clear grading criteria. Open note quizzes and labs. But the tests were lockdown browser and webcam. It was very difficult not having to learn anything for the quizzes and then taking the tests which were very hard.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Best online professor. He answers any questions and he emails you back within the day. 3 tests and they get curved. He drops lowest lab, hw, and quiz grade. He is super CARING and understanding. The labs can be difficult but he listens to the students and makes videos for certain questions. TAKE CLASS!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Great professor. He sends reminders every week listing the things that will be due. Plenty of time to finish assignments and things get graded quickly. His instructions are clear and his PowerPoints are easy to understand and navigate. Would take a class with him again in a heartbeat.

Took online and loved it. A lab and quiz are due every Monday at noon and occasionally a discussion post. Sends a reminder about due dates and info about next week. 2 tests and 1 final exam. Normally puts grades in within a week. Very specific about lockdown browser instructions. Drops 2 lowest quiz and lab grades and lowest discussion grade.

Super easy class! Quiz and Lab every week, along with five discussion boards throughout the semester. Everything is easy to access and do, it can feel repetitive doing the same stuff but everything is straightforward since you can look at the powerpoint and take the quiz and labs with them. Easy 100s without trying too hard at all. Take her!!

Extremely caring, keeps up with every student, has a background in meteorology, will help you very quickly, course goes from bare bones basics and up, extremely well taught, got to know him personally, and he wants to personally help me on my meteorology degree when I transfer to a school with that degree. He is golden.

quiz and lab weekly. open note and both easy with 2 dropped each. 2 tests and a final. he is super nice and encourages that you ask questions. tests ARE proctored, so you will have to study. he lets you review your old quizzes and takes a few questions from there to use on the tests.

Very easy class. He sends out a lot of reminders and is very easy to get in contact with. The tests are the only thing that is lockdown but they aren't too hard. There is also a lab and quiz due each week and a few discussion boards. As long as you do the work the class is very easy.

This was an online course, but getting in touch with Dr. Bartels was super easy and he was always nice. There are 3 test with a webcam requirement but if you study they aren't too hard. There is a lab and quiz due every week and they are pretty easy. The 2 lowest grades get dropped. Easy A if you do all your work

This was an online course, but getting in touch with Dr. Bartels was super easy and he was always so kind. There are 3 test with webcam but if you study they arent too hard. There is a lab and quiz due every week and they are pretty easy. The 2 lowest grades out of all of them get dropped. Easy A if you do all your work, definitely recommend !!

Dr. Bartels is such a great professor! I def recommend! The class was super easy, some of the labs were kind of challenging but you get 2 attempts of every lab. Only 3 tests and then a quiz and lab each week.

The material was very organized and he gave clear instructions. The tests are not too difficult and require a webcam but if you study the powerpoints you should be A ok. Labs are easy but time-consuming.
His class was not to tough but you learn a ton, a good balance. Dr. Bartel was there for questions if needed and answers emails fast. His class is set up great and he explain it well.
This was a fairly easy class, but a decent amount of work. The professor is insanely thorough and helpful too. I recommend this course and professor

Great professor, there are 3 tests and all webcam BUT most questions are directly from the quizzes and study guides. Also the quizzes can be found in the PowerPoint slides. Only thing really challenging are the labs but if you take your time and read it through, all the answers should be there
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: take him! Hes amazing and cares about his students! 12 open note quizzes (2 dropped), 12 labs (2 dropped) and 3 exams. Exams are lockdown with webcam but study the quizzes and do the study guide and you will pass. He does office hours if you need help on labs, quizzes, and study guides. Hes pretty chill. I enjoyed his class and learned a ton!

I had his class for 1112. This course was not difficult. There are quizzes and labs almost every week except for exam weeks. The labs can be tough but he let you drop 2. If you sent an email to him, he will reply quick. I would take his class again.
He was great. The hardest things about this class were the labs. They just require a lot of time. Study the quizzes, he uses the questions for test! Overall, take him!
